metadata.title: CVE-2024-44979 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe: Fix missing workqueue destroy in xe_gt_pagefaultOn driver reload we never free up the memory for the pagefault andaccess counter workqueues. Add those destroy calls here.(cherry picked from commit 7586fc52b14e0b8edd0d1f8a434e0de2078b7b2b)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.3').
